title: Download the Audit collector Helm chart (EKS)
content:
To download the Audit collector Helm chart to the bastion node, follow these steps:

  1. Log in to the bastion node and navigate to the directory where you want to download and install Audit collector, for example, auditcollector. In this directory, create a folder, for example, audit-collector-2x.x. 
    mkdir audit-collector-2x.x
cd audit-collector-2x.x
  2. Download the Audit_Collector_Helm_Chart-2x.x.zip file from the Software Licenses and Downloads (SLD) website to audit-collector-2x.x folder or the folder that you have created in Step 1.
  3. Unzip the package: 
    unzip Audit_Collector_Helm_Chart-2x.x.zip
  4. Untar the Audit collector chart package: 
    $tar -xvf audit-collector-<Version>.tgz
  5. Make sure you are in the audit-collector-2x.x folder or the folder that you have created in Step 1. Copy the Helm chart and the sample value.yaml files using the following commands: 
    cp audit-collector-helm-chart/audit-collector/charts/*.tgz .
cp audit-collector-helm-chart/audit-collector/samples/* .
